snippet: The poll is based on telephone interviews conducted May 13-17 with 1,300 adults nationwide. Of those, 1,109 said they were registered to vote.
lead_paragraph: The poll is based on telephone interviews conducted May 13-17 with 1,300 adults nationwide. Of those, 1,109 said they were registered to vote.

headline.main: How the New York Times/CBS News Poll Was Conducted
